mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "No More Levels", "Discovery: The Halfway Dance", "Folk Dance of America Report", "On the Air", "Frank Grundeen Takes A Look". "The Lloyd Shaw Archives and You", "A Great Home: Allemande Hall", "From the World Press", "Advice for Retiring Callers", "Hall of Fame: Bill Castner", "That the Handicapped May Dance", "Terminology of Clogging", "Free Listings", "Quarterly Movement Report", "Report from URDC", "Glory, Glory", "National Convention" and "Mileposts." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Traditional Treasury", "Ladies on the Square", "Mostly Modular", "Advanced Dancing", "Contra Corner", "Experimental Notes", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On The Record", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
